short_summary: Cleaning and maintenance services for Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada's Quebec Research and Development Centre
description: Providing cleaning and maintenance services for the main building of the Quebec Research and Development Centre including electrical, plumbing, and infrastructure services.
tags: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership
World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement
Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement
full_summary:
# Janitorial Services - Quebec Research and Development Centre

## Call for Tender
The Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, Quebec Research and Development Centre in Quebec City, Quebec, seeks to engage a contractor for janitorial services at the Centre's main building.

## Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: cb-843-55539850
* **Bid Solicitation Number**: 01B46-24-047
* **Publication Date**: November 13, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 18, 2024, 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: April 1, 2025
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2026

## Tender Status
This tender is currently open for receiving bids.

## Details of the Contract
The contract is for janitorial services, which include cleaning and maintenance of the main building. Manditory site visit at the Quebec Research and Development Centre, 2560 Hochelaga boulevard, Quebec, QC, G1V 2J3 on November 26, 2024, at 9h30 AM (local time) is mandatory.

## Trade Agreements
The contract is open to bidders from Canada and countries that have a free-trade agreement with Canada, such as the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, and more.

## Contact Information

* **Name**: Jean-François Lemay
* **Email**: [jean-francois.lemay@agr.gc.ca](mailto:jean-francois.lemay@agr.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: (343) 571-9706

## Tender Notice
You can find the complete tender notice, including terms and conditions, in the attached files:

* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/51651/rfp-2024-047-janitorial-%28qc_0.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/51651/ao-2024-047-entretien-menager-%28qc_1.pdf

You can submit your bid through the official Canada Buys website. Good luck with your proposal! 400 words.
